title: Anemone

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Plant yourself outside someone's house, redirecting their visitors to someone else.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You pick 2 targets. The visitors to the first target instead go to the second target.

> Roleblock Immunity.

> Control Immunity.

> Redirect Immunity.

desc:
Post 831
*"Oh, there is a flower infront of my targets door, guess I'll go to this house and kill whoever lives there instead."*
*"Random person was killed by a Mafioso. Their role was Mafioso."*
